article_title: Commentary: Why I’m ready for president to leave office
article_text:
Stillwater, OK (74074)

Today

Cloudy early, then thunderstorms developing this afternoon. A few storms may be severe. High 78F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%..

Tonight

Partly cloudy. A stray severe thunderstorm is possible. Low 61F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

article_metadata.author: Lawrence Ware

og.description: Barack Obama must be the most disrespected president in American history. First there were the questions about his birth certificate. Birthers, unaware that Hawaii joined the union in 1959, were
